title: Hardest True Nightmare
info: This Mode was verified by Emperor Berserk on 15th September 2025. This is currently the hardest challenge beaten in Oblitus Casa.
selfimposed: No Post Mortem, No Luring Together, No Flashing Together, No Corruptus Progression

title: True Nightmare No Luring & Flashing Together No Post Mortem
info: This Mode was verified by Emperor Berserk on 14th September 2025
selfimposed: No Post Mortem, No Luring Together, No Flashing Together

title: True Nightmare No Luring & Flashing Together
info: This Mode was verified by FunkyF on 18th Feb 2025
selfimposed: No Flashing Together, No Luring Together

title: True Nightmare No Luring Together No Post Mortem
info: This Mode was verified by Mlush.
selfimposed: No Post Mortem, No Luring Together

title: Smile Dog Evil Mode
info: !!!This mode is on a private build!!! This mode was verified by Nephryte on 20 Jan 2025. This is the current hardest creepypasta challenge.
selfimposed: No self imposed challenges for this mode.

title: Creepypasta Challenges Hard Mode Deathless In Order
info: This mode was verified by Nephryte on 23 Oct 2023, it is required that you play the modes in the order they're shown, Jeff -> Slenderman -> Smile Dog -> Eyeless Jack, in a row without dying.

title: True Nightmare No Luring Together
info: This mode was verified by Nephryte.
selfimposed: No Luring Together

title: Slenderman Evil Mode
info: !!!This mode is on a private build!!! This mode was verified by Nephryte. Evil Buff: 8 pages to 24. Only 8 pages spawn in at once and 8 more will spawn once you collect them all.

title: Hardest Eyeless Jack
info: This mode was verified by Nephryte. You cannot sprint which requires you to sneak up on Jack.
selfimposed: No Running

title: Eyeless Jack Evil Mode
info: !!!This mode is on a private build!!! This mode was verified by Nephyrte. Take 10 pictures to 50, instead of having an overall time limit you instead get only 45s per picture.

title: True Nightmare No Post Mortem
info: This mode was verified by Nephryte. This is the hardest base casa challenge.
selfimposed: No self imposed challenges for this mode.

title: Jeff The Killer Evil Mode
info: !!!This mode is on a private build!!! This mode was verified by Nephryte. You must now reboot the cameras by clicking on each of them 200 times instead of simply holding the camera button.
selfimposed: No self imposed challenges for this mode.

title: Night 6 No Camera Vision
info: This mode was verified by Emperor Berserk. This is night 6 but you have to close all the cameras before dealing with MickMick, Corrupted Face and Mother Notepad

title: True Nightmare No Luring Together

selfimposed: No Luring Together

title: True Nightmare No Post Mortem
info: This is the hardest challenge you can beat in legacy casa.
